Probability distribution cheatsheet

WILD8370: Bayesian Models for Conservation Science

updated on 2025-04-18

moment_matching.Rmd
library(WILD8370)

Normal distribution

Poisson distribution

Beta distribution

Moments

\Large \mu = \frac{\alpha}{\alpha + \beta}

\Large \sigma^2 = \frac{\alpha\beta}{(\alpha + \beta)^2 (\alpha + \beta + 1)}

Moment matching

\Large \alpha = \bigg(\frac{1-\mu}{\sigma^2}- \frac{1}{\mu} \bigg)\mu^2

\Large \beta = \alpha \bigg(\frac{1}{\mu}-1\bigg) ## Gamma distribution

Moments

\Large \mu = \frac{\alpha}{\beta}

\Large \sigma^2 = \frac{\alpha}{\beta^2}

Moment matching

\Large \alpha = \frac{\mu^2}{\sigma^2}

\Large \beta = \frac{\mu}{\sigma^2}
